through your abdomen to the 
uterus and pelvis.
The	sound	is	reflected	back	and	
creates a picture that is shown 
on a screen. It can be very 
exciting to see a picture of your 
own baby moving about inside 
you.
Ask for the picture to be 
explained to you if you cannot 
make it out. It should be possible 
for your partner to come with 
you and see the scan. Although 
scans are medical procedures, 
many couples feel that they help 
to make the baby real for them 
both.
